name: Bureaucrat Suits
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Hacker Tool" "87814" #L "Sealed Order BLCG-7791" "156330" (For Clan) or #L "Sealed Order XITL-0127" "156328" (For OMNI) #L "Expendable Hologram Camera" "156054" #L "ID-extractor" "156339" A Multi-Form needed ( ie #L "Omni-Tek Multi-Form" "156344" ) ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Hacker Tool + Sealed Order = Hacked Order ( ie : #L "Hacked Order BLCG-7791" "156336" ) Skills: | BE | ------------------------------ ID-extractor + Expendable Hologram Camera = #L "ID-data" "156340" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ ID-data + Hacked Order = Personal Order ( ie : #L "Personal Order BLCG-7791" "156352" ) Skills: | PS | ------------------------------ Multi-Form + Personal Order = Bureaucrat Suits Skills: | PS | ------------------------------ Details ------------------------------ #L "Sealed Order XITL-0127" "156328" #L "Omni-Tek Multi-Form" "156344" -> #L "OT Standard Executive Secretary Suit" "156528" #L "Sealed Order BLCG-7791" "156330" #L "Clans Multi-Form" "156346" -> #L "Standard Clans Administration Suit" "156530" #L "Sealed Order XITL-0127" "156328" #L "Clans Multi-Form" "156345" -> #L "Universal Office Worker Suit" "156538" #L "Sealed Order BLCG-7791" "156330" #L "Omni-Tek Multi-Form" "156344" -> #L "Universal Office Worker Suit" "156538" ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Nice buffs and they look great too.
